text: The following is a list of California Golden Bears football seasons for the football team that has represented University of California, Berkeley in NCAA competition. ==Seasons== == Rugby == Cal played rugby in various years instead of football and includes these rugby seasons within their football results with callout notes. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:right" !Year !W !L !T !PF !PA |- | 1882–83 || 2 || 1 || 1 || 24 || 13 |- | 1884 || 2 || 0 || 0 || 27 || 0 |- | 1885 || 4 || 0 || 1 || 23 || 0 |- | 1906 || 2 || 4 || 0 || 19 || 20 |- | 1907 || 4 || 3 || 0 || 67 || 42 |- | 1908 || 7 || 3 || 1 || 114 || 46 |- | 1909 || 12 || 3 || 1 || 268 || 57 |- | 1910 || 12 || 0 || 2 || 279 || 27 |- | 1911 || 11 || 2 || 1 || 256 || 34 |- | 1912 || 10 || 2 || 1 || 144 || 58 |- | 1913 || 6 || 3 || 3 || 105 || 110 |- | 1914 || 14 || 1 || 0 || 276 || 60 |} == References == Category:Lists of college football seasons Category:University of California-related lists
title: List of California Golden Bears football seasons
